Head.Name: Server Sales
Head.Title: Server Sales
Head.Description: This is the sales for specified day.

DataTable.DataSource: SELECT ed.last_name + ', ' + ed.first_name as name, e.net_sls_ttl, (et.trk_ttl_59 + et.trk_ttl_60 - et.trk_ttl_61 - et.trk_ttl_62) as 'Amount Due', et.trk_ttl_47 as 'AR', et.trk_ttl_48 as 'DepositRedeem', et.trk_ttl_49 as 'GC Redeem', et.trk_ttl_08 as 'CertSold' FROM micros.v_R_employee e inner join micros.v_r_employee_trk et on e.emp_seq = et.emp_seq and e.shift_number = et.shift_number inner join micros.emp_def ed on ed.emp_seq = e.emp_seq where CONVERT( CHAR(8), e.start_time, 112) = CONVERT( CHAR(8), @DateStart, 112) and e.net_sls_ttl <> 0 order by ed.obj_num
